title: Oman Recalls Its Trade Empire With Hand-Built Boats
teaser: The country of Oman once ran a vast maritime trading network. Today, a group there devotes itself to preserving that legacy by recreating the traditional boats that sailed the seas back then.
contentencoded:
The country of Oman once ran a vast maritime trading network. Today, a group there devotes itself to preserving that legacy by recreating the traditional boats that sailed the seas back then. This story originally ran on All Things Considered on Nov. 19, 2014.
